data.eml:eml: Redescription of Heterocerus fausti Reitter, 1879, bona species (Coleoptera, Heteroceridae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sazhnev, Alexey S. (2018): Redescription of Heterocerus fausti Reitter, 1879, bona species (Coleoptera, Heteroceridae). Zootaxa 4441 (3): 597-600, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4441.3.12
